downloadDescription: The Microsoft Office 2010 Developer Map helps you visualize the different kinds of applications, services, client/server data-access technologies, on-premise servers, platform products and technologies, and tools that can help developers build multiple line-of-business solutions.
detailsSection:
This download contains a .pdf version of the Office 2010 Developer Map poster. The poster highlights the following:
  • Office 2010 development
  • Office 2010 desktop applications
  • Office Mobile applications
  • Office 365 and Office Web Apps
  • Client/server data-access technologies for custom solutions
  • On-premise servers
  • Tools
  • Platform products and technologies
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  • Download the file by clicking the Download link and saving the file to your hard disk.

There is no removal feature for this download.
additionalInformationSection: This package does not collect any personal information.
